DOCNAME: DE CRISTOFARO v. ITALY AND OTHER APPLICATIONS
JUDGES: András Sajó;Françoise Tulkens;Guido Raimondi;Helen Keller;Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Paulo Pinto De Albuquerque
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant , Mr PERSON , is an NORP national born in GPE on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted proceedings before ORG .
CARDINAL . NORP The proceedings were concluded by a judgment dated DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant applied to ORG under PERSON no . CARDINAL of DATE , known as the “ Pinto Act ” , complaining about the excessive length of the above - mentioned proceedings .
CARDINAL . ORG , by a decree filed in the relevant registry on DATE , awarded to the applicant the sum of CARDINAL ORG as compensation .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date in DATE , the applicant challenged the decree of ORG of GPE before ORG complaining about the insufficient amount of the compensation obtained .

CARDINAL . The sum due was paid to the applicant on DATE . On DATE the applicant lodged an application with the ORG [ no . MONEY ] complaining about the delayed payment of the “ Pinto ” compensation .

CARDINAL . ORG , by a decision filed in the relevant registry on CARDINAL DATE , dismissed the appeal and ordered the applicant to pay the legal fees , costs and expenses of the proceedings quantified at CARDINAL EUR .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a further application with the ORG [ no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ] in relation to the same “ Pinto ” proceedings , complaining about the insufficiency of the “ Pinto ” compensation awarded to him , the order of ORG to pay legal fees , costs and expenses of the proceedings and the ineffectiveness of the “ Pinto ” remedy .
CARDINAL . The applicant , Mr PERSON , is an NORP national born in GPE ( GPE ) on DATE .
On DATE the applicant instituted administrative proceedings before ORG .
CARDINAL . The proceedings ended on DATE .

CARDINAL . NORP On DATE the applicant instituted “ Pinto ” proceedings before ORG of GPE , seeking compensation for the excessive length of the above - mentioned proceedings , which at the time were still pending .
CARDINAL . ORG of GPE , by a decree filed in the relevant registry on DATE , awarded to the applicant the sum of CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL EUR as compensation .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date in DATE the applicant challenged the decree before ORG , complaining about the insufficiency of the compensation obtained .
CARDINAL . The sum due was paid to the applicant on DATE .

CARDINAL . ORG , by a decision filed in the relevant registry on CARDINAL DATE , dismissed the appeal and ordered the applicant to pay the legal fees , costs and expenses of the proceedings quantified at CARDINAL EUR .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged an application with the ORG [ no . CARDINAL ] complaining , inter alia , about the insufficient amount of the “ Pinto ” compensation .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a further application with the ORG [ no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ] in relation to the same “ Pinto ” proceedings , complaining about the delayed payment of the “ Pinto ” compensation and the ineffectiveness of the “ Pinto ” remedy .
CARDINAL . The applicant , Mr PERSON , is an NORP national born in GPE on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the applicant filed an appeal against a decision of the ORG before ORG .
CARDINAL . The final judgment in the proceedings was delivered on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted “ Pinto ” proceedings before ORG , seeking compensation for the excessive length of the above - mentioned proceedings .
CARDINAL . By a decree filed in the relevant registry on DATE , ORG of GPE awarded to the applicant the sum of CARDINAL ORG as compensation .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date in DATE , the applicant challenged the decree before ORG , complaining about the insufficiency of the compensation obtained .
CARDINAL . On DATE the sum awarded by ORG was paid to the applicant .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged an application with the ORG [ no . PERSON ] complaining about the delayed payment of the compensation awarded by ORG .
CARDINAL . By a decision filed in the relevant registry on DATE , ORG upheld the appeal of the applicant and increased the compensation to CARDINAL ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the sum due was paid to the applicant .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a further application with the ORG [ no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ] in relation to the same “ Pinto ” proceedings , complaining about the delayed payment of the “ Pinto ” compensation awarded by ORG and the ineffectiveness of the “ Pinto ” remedy .
CARDINAL . The applicant , Mr PERSON , is an NORP national born in GPE on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted administrative proceedings before ORG . The final judgment in the proceedings was delivered on DATE .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date in DATE the applicant instituted “ Pinto ” proceedings before ORG of GPE , seeking compensation for the excessive length of the above - mentioned proceedings .
CARDINAL . By a decree filed in the relevant registry on DATE , ORG of GPE awarded to the applicant the sum of CARDINAL ORG as compensation .
CARDINAL . The sum due was paid to the applicant on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant filed an application ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) before the ORG complaining about the delayed payment of the compensation awarded by ORG of GPE .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date in DATE the applicant challenged the decree of ORG of GPE before ORG , complaining about the insufficiency of the compensation obtained .
CARDINAL . By a decision filed in the relevant registry on DATE , ORG upheld the appeal and increased the compensation to CARDINAL ORG .
CARDINAL . The sum due was paid to the applicant on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a further application with ORG ( no . CARDINAL ) in relation to the same “ Pinto ” proceedings , complaining about the delayed payment of the “ Pinto ” compensation awarded by ORG and the ineffectiveness of the “ Pinto ” remedy .
